summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件创建显示图像的按钮。Use the control to create a button that displays an image. 你可以以编程方式控制与关联的操作通过提供的事件处理程序的控制事件。You can programmatically control the action associated with the control by providing an event handler for the event. 当用户单击的坐标使用来确定控件和属性作为参数传递到用户定义的事件处理程序的对象。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object that is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建显示图像的按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a button that displays an image. > [!NOTE] > 必须提供您自己图像文件，此示例正常工作。You must provide your own image files for this example to work correctly. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当图像不可用或尚未下载时浏览器显示的替换文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternative text that the browser displays if the image is unavailable or has not been downloaded.

value.span: 所指定图像的替换文本。

span.span: The alternative text for the specified image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在指定的映像不可用或尚未下载时显示的文本。Use the property to specify the text to display when the specified image is not available or has not been downloaded. 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式确定指定的替换文本。You can also use this property to programmatically determine the specified alternative text. 中支持的工具提示功能的浏览器，此文本也显示为工具提示控件。In browsers that support the ToolTip feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示图像不可用时的备用文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text to display when the image is not available. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的边框宽度控件。Use the property to specify the border width for the control. > [!NOTE] > 所有浏览器不支持此属性。This property is not supported in all browsers. 检查你的浏览器来确定兼容性。Check your browser to determine compatibility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的边框宽度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the border width for the control. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，执行页验证时控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常用在事件处理程序事件，以防止在单击取消或重置按钮时出现的页验证。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止在发生的页验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意如何方法单独激活每个验证控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/CS/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/VB/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 处理 控件的回发数据。

span.span: Processes the postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果 控件的状态已因回发而更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法进行检查以查看是否表示用户单击该图像的位置的位置的坐标的回发数据的一部分控件。The method checks to see whether coordinates that represent the location where the image was clicked by the user are part of the postback data for the control. 如果坐标属于回发数据中，则方法寄存器为需要它处理时引发事件的控件在网页上的控件。If coordinates are part of the postback data, then the method registers the control with the Web page as a control that requires an event to be raised when it is processed. > [!NOTE] > 原点坐标 (0，0) 位于图像的左上角。The origin coordinates (0,0) are located in the upper-left corner of the image. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正好在呈现之前调用方法控件。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它始终显示自定义不带边框的服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a custom server control with no border. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.para: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户单击时引发事件控件。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 当用户单击的坐标使用来确定控件和属性对象。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object. 对象作为参数传递到用户定义的事件处理程序。The object is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. > [!NOTE] > 原点 （0，0） 位于图像的左上角。The origin (0, 0) is located at the upper-left corner of the image. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件来确定当用户单击的坐标控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Notifies the control that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不参与的处理控制，并且将包含完成接口实现。The method does not participate in the processing of the control and is included to complete the interface implementation. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会解析在中设置的 URL属性，写入`onclick`属性呈现控制如果属性是`true`，最后调用基和方法。The method resolves the URL set in the property, writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered control if the property is `true`, and finally calls the base method. 如果值属性是一个格式不正确的 URL，引发异常。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, an exception is thrown. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便为工具提示，可访问的特定备用文本始终显示为带有。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific alternate text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed with the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributes.vb#2)]

exception.span: 属性包含格式不正确的 URL。

span.span: The property contains a malformed URL.

summary.span: 当用户单击 控件时，在服务器上发生。

span.span: Occurs on the server when the user clicks an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户单击时引发事件控件。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件来确定当用户单击的坐标控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Src { get; set; }
.property instance string Src
Public Property Src As String
public: property System::String ^ Src { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Src : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the image file.
The location of the image file.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在中显示的图像的位置控件。Use the property to specify the location of the image to display in the control. 中未提供该映像时，指定的文本属性显示。If the image is not available, the text specified in the property is displayed. 你可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or absolute URL. 相对 URL 相关到 Web 页的位置的映像的位置，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 该路径是相对 Web 页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这使得更轻松地移动整个站点到另一个目录服务器上而无需更新于代码中的图像的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 你可以使用相对路径" `~/` "来指代当前页所处的虚拟目录。You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located. 例如，值为为``页上的"XspTest"虚拟目录是``。For example, the value of for `` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is ``. 绝对 URL 提供的完整路径。An absolute URL provides the complete path. 因此，将站点移动到另一个目录，你需要更新代码。Therefore, moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的路径中显示的图像控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the path to an image displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组从其他页上的验证组可以独立进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值与属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证时的控件控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 页面包含用于捕获从用户的数据的两个文本框和两个控件以确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控件中的第一个文本框是`CityInfoGroup`验证组和控件中的第二个框是`StateInfoGroup`验证组。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 当`CityQueryButton`单击后，仅在控件`CityInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 当`StateQueryButton`单击后，仅在控件`StateInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/cs/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/vb/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
